snippet.title: Persona 2: Innocent Sin (PlayStation) | Opening Movie | Persona 25th
snippet.description:
Persona 2: Innocent Sin was released in 1999 for PlayStation, and shifted the series to Seven Sisters High School. Innocent Sin and the following game, Persona 2: Eternal Punishment, form one overarching story.

We'll be uploading Persona openings each week - stay tuned for more, and let us know in the comments what your favorite Persona title is!
